On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Boyong Mañalac, Hoodlum Terminator (Father's Day Special)
programme.desc: He used to be an outlaw, now, he is feared by the criminals. An action-filled chapter in the life of Boyong Manalac, on how he terminates the notorious hoodlums one by one in cold blood, and how this affects him and his family.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 7
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. This cold case is close to her heart because the victim happens to be her estranged half sister, Ana Madrigal. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.

programme.title: Binibining Marikit
programme.desc: This is the story of Marikit, or Ikit, a hardworking and cheerful Dumagat Remontado tour guide. Raised by her father Gani after being abandoned by her mother Mayumi, Ikit grows up believing that her mother left them for ambition. Their lives take a turn when Rica, a widow, and her daughter Angela arrive in Daraitan, scheming to buy Dumagat lands for a development project.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Forever
programme.desc: Mikee had led a charmed life. Now she was engaged to marry the man who was considered by her rich parents as the most suitable for their daughter. But Mikee wanted more out of life.

programme.title: Makuha Ka Sa Tingin
programme.desc: Elcid (Robin Padilla) and his buddy, Tembong (Dennis Padilla), decided to got to Manila to search for greener pastures in Manila.

programme.title: Ma'am, May We Go Out (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Tito, Vic and Joey were lazy bums who would inherit a fortune if they would be able to graduate from high school. It was not easy but it helped that the P.E. teacher is Carmi Martin.

programme.title: Wala Na Bang Pag-ibig?
programme.desc: For years, they have been the best of friends. Gemma is bratty Eric’s buddy, and to some extent, accomplice in his not too few escapades. But what if one day, all of a sudden, Gemma feels something different for Eric?

programme.title: Kung Kasalanan Man (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Irma was the innocent wife, who was caught in a web of evil spunned by the people she loved. Confused, alone and penniless, she had only Mike to turn to. That is if he would believe her.

programme.title: Bahala Na VS Sputnik
programme.desc: \"Bahala na\" and \"Sigue-Sigue Sputnik\" are two of the most wanted gangs decades ago. They fought more than any other notorious criminals. They fear no law and life for them is a life of violence. They have no Lords other than their brotherhood until their world self-destructed.

programme.title: Mga Batang Yagit
programme.desc: This tells the story of young orphans reduced to scavenging among garbage to make a living.

programme.title: Lihim
programme.desc: Bianca and her friends sailed off to the pristine and beautiful Palawan for a few days of fun. Living in the city had made them hungry for the isolation an island resort offers. But then, tragedy struck just when they were starting to have fun.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang
programme.desc: A librarian's husband turn out to be psychotically abusive. When the husband mistakenly thinks he has killed her, he dumps her in a river. In need of help to take revenge, she hooks up with a bank robber and together they kill him.

programme.title: Bukas May Pangarap
programme.desc: A peasant couple set all their worldly possesions so that the husband can take advantage of an overseas job offer. But a tragedy is bound to bring his marriage and family life to ruin.

programme.title: Pulis Probinsya (Pat. Omar Abdullah)
programme.desc: A cop from the province gets a new assignment in the big city. He was disappointed to find out that he would be living and working in a different turf where the games played are almost always deadly.

programme.title: Astig
programme.desc: Dennis Padilla and Janno Gibbs made their living by putting one over small time con-artists. They became very good at what they were doing so that they were soon recruited into the big-time.

programme.title: Sala Sa Init, Sala Sa Lamig
programme.desc: Bingo was a bounty hunter. He hunted prized criminals dead or alive. On the other hand, Vina was a street hustler. They crossed paths when Bingo rented a space near Vina purposely to track down a professional hitman, Mike.

programme.title: Sa Diyos Lang Ako Susuko
programme.desc: Romano disobeyed his father when he became a soldier. The old man believed that peace could only be attained if people were to avoid all forms of violence. How ironic for him then to come home and find his father murdered and the criminals unknown and unpunished?

programme.title: Pati Ba Pintig ng Puso? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia was at his best as the autocratic patriarch who ruled his family and all the people around him with an iron hand. But his grandson would have none of this.

programme.title: Tatlo Silang Tatay Ko
programme.desc: Siamese triplets Brando, Butch and Bronson (TVJ) are forced to take in the newly-orphaned Nitoy (Niño Muhlach). The journey from downright hostility to tolerance to acceptance and finally to filial love is a fun adventure guaranteed to amuse everybody.

programme.title: Pablik Enemi 1 N 2: Aksidental Heroes
programme.desc: Redford White and Dennis Padilla team in this fast paced wacky adventure as two bumbling idiots on the run after accidentally picking up a suitcase full of smuggled goods.

programme.title: Sa Kabila ng Lahat
programme.desc: Dina Bonnevie was a famous television commentator whose work was focused on social issues particularly corruption in the government. However, because she was having an affair with a politician, who was helping her further her career, she turned a blind eye to his own evil deeds.

programme.title: Sa Hirap at Ginhawa (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: In the story, a young couple eloped, got married and then must cope with problems like money, living on their own, trying to finish school and raising a baby.

programme.title: Demolisyon
programme.desc: This film presents the struggles of people to have a home of their own and the pain and the anguish they face when they are forced out of their homes and the shanties they thought they owned are demolished.

programme.title: Sa Totoo Lang
programme.desc: Some of the country's finest actors joined the fun in this witty and totally hilarious look into the sex lives of lower middle class women who were old and single or separated, widowed, grass widowed, fooling around and everything else you could think of plus the assortment of men they met, fell for, cheated on, disliked, feared or anything else.

programme.title: Mahal Kita, Alam Mo Ba?
programme.desc: In his rush to escape from the policemen, Mario disguised himself as an Arab. At that same moment, Teresa was waiting for the Arab prince she was supposed to marry, whom she has never seen before. In the rush, she thought Mario was her prince and brought him home to meet her parents.

programme.title: Tatlong Anak, Isang Ama
programme.desc: Set in the city of Olongapo during the last days of the US bases in the Philippines, this is a tale about the life of a musician and his three sons by three different women.
